The word cosmos comes from the Greek kósmos <[silence:250]> meaning "order" or "ornament" <[silence:1200]>
Pythagoras first used it to describe the universe’s harmonious structure <[silence:1200]>
Later <[silence:250]> it evolved to signify the entire celestial realm <[silence:3600]>
